text: Govardhan Mangilal Sharma is a member of the 13th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. He represents the Akola-West Assembly Constituency. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party. ==References== Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:People from Akola Category:Living people Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Maharashtra Category:1964 births Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2019–
title: Govardhan Mangilal Sharma
